body_html: Ah - that's unfortunate. Sorry I didn't try the PR with tf-nightly jobs. But I'm still not sure if this PR is going to fix all cases. For example, if $PYTHON_BIN_PATH points to a python 3 version, the module name used after -m should be venv, but not virtualenv.
body_text: Ah - that's unfortunate. Sorry I didn't try the PR with tf-nightly jobs. But I'm still not sure if this PR is going to fix all cases. For example, if $PYTHON_BIN_PATH points to a python 3 version, the module name used after -m should be venv, but not virtualenv.
body: Ah - that's unfortunate. Sorry I didn't try the PR with tf-nightly jobs. But I'm still not sure if this PR is going to fix all cases. For example, if `$PYTHON_BIN_PATH` points to a python 3 version, the module name used after `-m` should be `venv`, but not `virtualenv`.
